description:
The most intelligent of the three cyborgs accompanying Orora Hime on her travel. When in doubt he asks his portable computer (which often displays TOEI logo while elaborating a problem).
He flies the vessel Starcopper (equipped for both space and underwater travels) and fights with the Laser-Trident.
His character is based on the water-demon, Sha Wujing.
name: Sir Jogo
